scripts.dev: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next dev
scripts.build: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next build
scripts.start: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next start
scripts.install-python-deps: if [ "$OS" != "Windows_NT" ]; then chmod -R u+rw .; else icacls . /grant %username%:F /T; fi && pip install -r requirements.txt || pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Python dependencies installed automatically on npm run dev/build/start. Manual install: pip install -r requirements.txt'
